name: Tommy Khoo
feedback: The adoption of ChatGPT has been disappointing. The training was inadequate, and the newsletters are not helpful. I prefer traditional methods.

name: Jessie Ang
feedback: I struggled to see the benefit of using ChatGPT for emails. The training was not engaging, and the newsletters did not address my concerns.

name: Joel Loh
feedback: The initiative is promising, but the initial training felt too basic. The newsletters are informative, but more interactive content would be beneficial.

name: Bob Smith
feedback: ChatGPT has improved my email efficiency. The training was helpful, though I would appreciate more advanced sessions. The newsletters are a great resource.

name: Eva Green
feedback: I find ChatGPT useful for drafting emails. The training sessions were good, but I suggest including more real-world examples. The newsletters are very helpful.

name: Alice Johnson
feedback: The adoption of ChatGPT in email writing has been transformative. The training sessions were comprehensive and the newsletters keep us updated with best practices.

name: David Brown
feedback: Excellent initiative! The training was thorough and the newsletters provide valuable tips. ChatGPT has significantly enhanced my email writing skills.
